verses.verse: As <S%H7950>snow<s%> in <S%H7019>summer<s%>, and as <S%H4306>rain<s%> in <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, So <S%H3519>honor<s%> is not <S%H5000>seemly<s%> for a <S%H3684>fool<s%>.
As the <S%H6833>sparrow<s%> in her <S%H5110>wandering<s%>, as the <S%H1866>swallow<s%> in her <S%H5774>flying<s%>, So the <S%H7045>curse<s%> that is <S%H2600>causeless<s%> alighteth <S%H935>not<s%>.
A <S%H7752>whip<s%> for the <S%H5483>horse<s%>, a <S%H4964>bridle<s%> for the <S%H2543>ass<s%>, And a <S%H7626>rod<s%> for the <S%H1460>back<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%>.
Answer <S%H6030><s%> not a <S%H3684>fool<s%> according to his <S%H200>folly<s%>, Lest thou also be like unto <S%H7737>him<s%>.
Answer <S%H6030><s%> a <S%H3684>fool<s%> according to his <S%H200>folly<s%>, Lest he be <S%H2450>wise<s%> in his own <S%H5869>conceit<s%>.

He that <S%H7971>sendeth<s%> a <S%H1697>message<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%> Cutteth <S%H7096>off<s%> his own <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and <S%H8354>drinketh<s%> in <S%H2555>damage<s%>.
The <S%H7785>legs<s%> of the <S%H6455>lame<s%> hang <S%H1809>loose<s%>: So is a <S%H4912>parable<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%>.
As one that <S%H6872>bindeth<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%> in a <S%H4773>sling<s%>, So is he that <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H3519>honor<s%> to a <S%H3684>fool<s%>.
As a <S%H2336>thorn<s%> that goeth <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H7910>drunkard<s%>, So is a <S%H4912>parable<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%>.
As an <S%H7227>archer<s%> that <S%H2342>woundeth<s%> <S%H7936>all<s%>, So is he that hireth a <S%H3684>fool<s%> and he that <S%H7936>hireth<s%> them that pass <S%H5674>by<s%>.
As a <S%H3611>dog<s%> that <S%H7725>returneth<s%> to his <S%H6892>vomit<s%>, So is a <S%H3684>fool<s%> that <S%H8138>repeateth<s%> his <S%H200>folly<s%>.
Seest <S%H7200><s%> thou a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> in his own <S%H5869>conceit<s%>? There is more <S%H8615>hope<s%> of a fool than of <S%H3684>him<s%>.
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%>, There is a <S%H7826>lion<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>; A <S%H7826>lion<s%> is in the <S%H7339>streets<s%>.
As the <S%H1817>door<s%> <S%H5437>turneth<s%> upon its <S%H6735>hinges<s%>, So doth the <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> upon his <S%H4296>bed<s%>.
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H2934>burieth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> in the <S%H6747>dish<s%>; It <S%H3811>wearieth<s%> him to bring it <S%H7725>again<s%> to his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> is <S%H2450>wiser<s%> in his own <S%H5869>conceit<s%> Than seven <S%H7651>men<s%> that can <S%H7725>render<s%> a <S%H2940>reason<s%>.
He that passeth <S%H5674>by<s%>, and <S%H5674>vexeth<s%> himself with <S%H7379>strife<s%> belonging not to <S%H2388>him<s%>, Is like one that taketh a <S%H3611>dog<s%> by the <S%H241>ears<s%>.
As a <S%H3856>madman<s%> who <S%H3384>casteth<s%> <S%H2131>firebrands<s%>, <S%H2671>Arrows<s%>, and <S%H4194>death<s%>,
So is the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7411>deceiveth<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, And <S%H559>saith<s%>, Am not I in <S%H7832>sport<s%>?
For <S%H657>lack<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> goeth <S%H3518>out<s%>; And where there is no <S%H5372>whisperer<s%>, <S%H4066>contention<s%> <S%H8367>ceaseth<s%>.
As <S%H6352>coals<s%> are to hot <S%H1513>embers<s%>, and <S%H6086>wood<s%> to <S%H784>fire<s%>, So is a <S%H4079>contentious<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H2787>inflame<s%> <S%H7379>strife<s%>.
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of a <S%H5372>whisperer<s%> are as dainty <S%H3859>morsels<s%>, And they go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H990>innermost<s%> <S%H2315>parts<s%>.
Fervent <S%H1814><s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> and a <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> Are like an <S%H2789>earthen<s%> vessel <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> with <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H5509>dross<s%>.
He that <S%H8130>hateth<s%> <S%H5234>dissembleth<s%> with his <S%H8193>lips<s%>; But he layeth <S%H7896>up<s%> <S%H4820>deceit<s%> within <S%H7130>him<s%>:
When he <S%H6963>speaketh<s%> <S%H2603>fair<s%>, <S%H539>believe<s%> him <S%H7651>not<s%>; For there are seven <S%H8441>abominations<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>:
Though his <S%H8135>hatred<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> itself with <S%H4860>guile<s%>, His <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> shall be openly <S%H1540>showed<s%> before the <S%H6951>assembly<s%>.
Whoso <S%H3738>diggeth<s%> a <S%H7845>pit<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H1556>therein<s%>; And he that rolleth a <S%H68>stone<s%>, it shall return upon <S%H7725>him<s%>.
A <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H8130>hateth<s%> those whom it hath <S%H1790>wounded<s%>; And a <S%H2509>flattering<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H6213>worketh<s%> <S%H4072>ruin<s%>.
